json_parsing_pattern.description: Standard pattern to insert after each Task tool invocation
json_parsing_pattern.bash_code:
# Parse agent JSON response (non-blocking)
if echo "$AGENT_RESPONSE" | source venv/bin/activate && python scripts/parse-agent-json.py 2>/dev/null; then
  : # JSON parsed successfully, summary displayed
else
  : # Graceful fallback - agent returned 'complete' string
fi
notes: AGENT_RESPONSE is Task tool return value
Exit code 0 = JSON parsed, exit code 1 = fallback (not error)
Use : (no-op) in if/else to maintain structure without extra output
json_parsing_pattern.alternative_simplified: echo "$AGENT_RESPONSE" | source venv/bin/activate && python scripts/parse-agent-json.py 2>/dev/null || true
json_parsing_pattern.why_simplified_better: Single line, || true ensures non-blocking even if script fails
